item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, January 1, 2025 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:

26. Systems ideas that sound good but almost never work (347 points | 211 comments)

29. At least 10 killed after vehicle hits crowd of people in New Orleans (3 points | discuss)
